report_metadata.approach: Multi-exemplar guided generation with essential quality filtering

exemplar_effectiveness.pattern_diversity: Multiple contexts covering different policy aspects

pattern_diversity_analysis.pattern_coverage: Multiple regulatory contexts with diverse structures
pattern_diversity_analysis.learning_approach: Few-shot pattern recognition from varied examples

few_shot_approach.method: Multi-exemplar guided generation using diverse high-quality template questions
few_shot_approach.exemplar_sources: Multiple manually constructed regulatory texts with KG triples
few_shot_approach.pattern_diversity: Varied contexts covering different policy aspects and structures
few_shot_approach.filtering_approach: Essential quality filters: length requirements + duplicate detection

advantages_of_few_shot: Provides diverse pattern recognition through multiple exemplars
Enables learning from varied question structures and approaches
Reduces over-fitting to single exemplar patterns
Maintains quality while increasing structural variety
Better coverage of domain-specific language patterns

pattern_learning_insights.domain_adaptation: Better adaptation to regulatory language patterns
pattern_learning_insights.quality_consistency: Maintained quality across diverse pattern types
